Re 13/16 Pump and Dump
A scheme where people will hype a project with no fundamentals in order to make the price of the #token increase to then sell their holdings to earn profit

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 11/16 HODL
Originated in 2013 after a post on the #Bitcoin forum by a user who posted “I AM HODLING” with a typo, it is used to refer to when someone is holding on to their tokens instead of selling them

articles.description:
Re 10/16 Degen
Short for degenerate and is used to refer to people who trade without doing research and/or due diligence 📖

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 8/16 Gas & Gwei ⛽
Gas is the fee required to complete a transaction on the #ETH blockchain
Gwei is the denomination of $ETH that the gas price is paid in (1 Gwei = 0.000000001 ETH)

Re 6/16 dApps

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 4/16 Bullish 🐂
Opposite of bearish
If you are feeling bullish, you expect the market to rise and have positive sentiment 📈
articles.title: Re 4/16 Bullish 🐂 Opposite of bearish If you are feeling bullish, you expect the market to rise and have positive sentiment 📈

articles.description:
Re 3/16 Bearish 🐻
